name: tungle Tumblr theme
description: Changes Tumblr's dashboard interface completely to look like what frightbot's super computer predicts it will look like in 2020. This style was designed to make Tumblr look as terrible as possible while still being completely usable.
additional_info: 2015-11-17 - Added in notifications for messages (I knew I was forgetting something) 2015-11-12 - Added some new styles for the messaging update 2015-09-06 - Fixed some things getting hidden when editing or creating posts, added ripped border effect around a couple more things

discussions.name: beautiful.  i am truly living in the future.
a true work of art... i cry
it's me frightbot creator of the Horrible Tungle Post
